Question.Subject: twitter or face book?
Question.Content: my sister wants to know which is better i also forgot to mention what about myspace
Question.ChosenAnswer: facebook. i have both and i think twitter is a bit silly unless you NEED to know what a celebrity is doing every second of the day. otherwise you can just text your friends instead of tweet.

Answer.Content: facebook. i have both and i think twitter is a bit silly unless you NEED to know what a celebrity is doing every second of the day. otherwise you can just text your friends instead of tweet.

Facebook because it has the status updates of twitter+the groups, apps, etc. Facebook is also better because a lot more people use it. One thing that makes twitter better is that you can get mobile text message updates from your friends.
